entry.title: Monday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
